story.hline: Kyle Jamieson to undergo back surgery
story.intro: The New Zealand fast bowler is likely to be out of action for up to four months

coverImage.caption: Jamieson suffered a relapse of the back injury that hampered him on the tour of England last year.

story.hline: 'The decade belongs to Saurashtra' - Unadkat after Ranji Trophy win

story.hline: Matthews stars as West Indies clinch thriller against Pakistan

story.hline: Bumrah yet to get NCA clearance; workload in IPL to be monitored

story.hline: India make the most of Australia's sweep stumble
story.intro: Australia, guilty of being too eager to play the sweep shot against the spinners, went from challenging India to being blown away in matter of over an hour at the Arun Jaitley Stadium
story.seoHeadline: India make the most of Australia's sweep stumble

coverImage.caption: Smith was among the handful of batters who fell attempting the sweep shot in Australia's second innings.
